attributes.action: put pressure on the BBC to dismiss Mark Thompson and Jonathan Ross.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mark Thompson has presided over an organisation that has helped accelerate the decline of public decency and has helped promote yob culture. Jonathan Ross has been one of his key agents in promoting these goals. Their continued employment by the BBC is a threat to the organisation’s existence.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
